title: Introducing: La Femme
content:
Combining stripy tees and berets along with soft, husky native tones creates a band about as French as you can get, right? La Femme are definitely not traditional.

Self-described as “lo-fi surf-pop” they’ve essentially got some physche-punk rock vibes going down, with definite Velvet Underground influences (and they’ve recently been compared to the Drums).

It’s time to wake up (below) showcases their style, but their Baby Doll mix is also worth a listen.

If you’re in to them they’re currently touring and you can check them out in the USA in March/April and La Scala in London on 25th May.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d09
